channel.title: Did they get rid of Scar on this website?
channel.description: I used to play RS a while back and wanna get back into it, especially autoing, but i can not find Scar anywhere and I used to buy scripts off this site, did they move Scar to a new website or did they just completely get rid of it? Whats the deal?
